name: Furyfold
description:
A reverse tower defense game where you attack the towers. The game follows a band of Origami creatures facing a world of wizards imbued with the power of fire. The player manages troops - both as resources to fund their adventure, and to do damage, your ultimate goal. In this race for glory, it is not so clear as to whether your cause is right at all.

CONTROLS:

Number 1 - To queue a Butterfly to be made, these can help you fold more origami at a time, and do not attack

Number 2 - To queue a Cat to be made, these attack the towers.

Shift + Number 1 - Dequeues a Butterfly.

Shift + Number 2 - Dequeues a Cat.
